caption: Everything about this place is phenomenal. Ambience, service, food. You HAVE to order the oyster mushroom.
simply the most special restaurant in Miami. a must.
Absolutely loved it! Everything we ordered was delicious
Wow the food was epic, fresh ! and the location has so much character.  Great vibes !! Try the burratta pizza and the carrots soo goood !

This is the best pizza I've ever had. The chef and staff show a true passion for their craft, which extends to the starter dishes, wine selection, and décor. The food and ambiance are understated and flawlessly executed.
This is my favorite pizza anywhere in the world. The atmosphere is very comfortable and  the service is great. Make sure to try their delicious natural wine selection too!

5 stars! We all really enjoyed everything we selected the pizzas were Amazing, the pasta al pesto, the oyster mushrooms in salsa verde wow I am already thinking when I can go back! Will become a regular spot for sure. Aside from the food, you can tell Every detail is thought out - lots of soul. The music, the gorgeous bar, the minimalist clean design...the glassware. You can tell the owners really care about providing a great experience. They are super friendly  and so are the staff working for them. Complimenti

Superb pizza - unlike anything I have ever had. The pesto pizza is a must. The pineapple appetizer will blow your mind. Super stylish and spacious space. High level of attention to detail by the chef and the staff. Super friendly and welcoming. I would highly recommend! Can’t wait to go back!
Great service and amazing food! The pizza is out of this world, but the appetizers are even better. Can't wait to come back.

Make sure you have a reservation, if not they wont sit you even if they have tables available. They should specify this on the website. I’ve heard food is amazing here but the service definitely is not....
Best place ever! It feels like home, and the owners are family. It is aesthetically pleasing and beautiful. If you want to be in the best spot, with the best food, and music this is it!!!!!

I CANT EVEN TELL YOU. I’m at a loss for words at how amazing this place is. I have been coming every week since open and I know consider it as my second home. The owners are actual angels. The food is a dream. And the wine selection is like none other. I can’t say anything but good accolades about my every single experience at La Natural. 🤍🤍🤍🤍

The lovely couple that owns this amazing hidden gem in Miami deserves every star 🌟 the food, the hospitality, the vibes, the staff, the decor is just so lovely. We came with a big group and they treated us like family. I can’t recommend enough to check this out.
(Translated by Google) Great experience the spectacular pizza.  (Original) Gran experiencia la pizza espectacular.

(Translated by Google) The best place, the best pizza in the world. Greeeeeaaaaaat, amaziiiing pizza OMGGG  (Original) El mejor lugar, la mejor pizza del mundo mundial. Greeeeeaaaaaat, amaziiiing pizza OMGGG
I love this place!!! The pizza is insanely good and love the natural wine list. Such good energy and vibe in this place.

The place is beautiful but I think the owner is a little over her head. Me and my wife had a reservation and after we were sitting down for ten minutes I politely called a lady and told her that we would like to order some drinks when she had a chance and she got offended and right away stated with attitude that she was the owner and that as we can see the place was very busy. It went downhill after that I asked her if there is anything she would recommend to which she responded very rudely again that everything was good and since it was her restaurant she couldn’t recommend one thing over another. In regards to the food the Pizza is OK at best.
Great experience!
LOVE
This restaurant is one of the most underrated spots in miami. Highly recommend the mushrooms and plant based pizza! The service was amazing and the atmosphere was fantastic! Will return soon.

Nice ambiance but that’s it. Food was bland and completely unseasoned. I heard the table next to us complaining about the same thing. There are staples in cooking called salt and pepper they really need to look into. The staff was not very welcoming nor attentive. Nobody came to ask what we wanted so we had to wave someone down to order. Oh and the pricing is totally outrageous with the tip being included for the horrid service. Best part of this place is that it’s a 4 minute drive to The Citadel where you can get some seasoned and tasty eats. Do yourself a favor and skip this one. Spend half the amount and get a much better meal elsewhere.

Wow Wow Wow. This is the best dinner I have had in Miami. The food is Amazing!!!! The decor is perfect. We loved sitting outside. We can not wait to go back and try more. Thanks for an amazing dinner!!

the BEST... from beginning to end... my second home... a place you will crave for... please enjoy the details... from music, to decor, and of course the food... totally in love! thanks for adding this gem to Miami.
I love this place... I wanna pack them and take them to Williamsburg! They are simply killing it...
The food is super bad and not tasty at all. I would avoid this place if you want good pizza. The owner is super mean and not very social nor does he care about his quests. Eat at your own risk.

This place was great! The owner immediately greeted us and was very humble and passionate about this place. We loved hearing the stories on how this place came to be. The food was simply outstanding. Such simple ingredients with outstanding profiles. The Japanese sweet potato is absolutely amazing! The sourdough bread on the pizza is definitely a twist. It has this light and fluffy taste to it where it’s not overpowering.  This is a no tipping restaurant, which working in the industry for years, was quite shocking. We decided to leave a tip anyways, we’re all living during hard times.  Can’t wait to go back and try more things on the menu!  Oh and they serve natural wine, since a difference comparing to wines that were sprayed with pesticides during the beginning stages.

Best Pizza in Florida, period! Thank god for a place like this! The interiors, the music, the vibe and the food is amazing! The staff was very friendly! I have to say that it’s very easy for someone to post a negative review based on others opinion relating to the owner. We live in a time where cancel culture is very easy and the people you have to watch out for are the ones that sit behind a computer and post something negative without even knowing the food or having a mind of their own. It’s 2021, I think it’s time people start having a mind of their own, an opinion of their own based on their own experiences not based on what other people say. This place was amazing. I will go back over and over again. No one and no article is going to stop me from having the best pizza and the best food in town served by the nicest staff.

I've been twice already and can't wait to go back for all the things in the menu that I haven't tried yet. It's very tough not to order the burrata pizza after you've tasted it for the first time. The tomatoes are incredible in taste and simplicity. The sourdough is addictive and special.  The onion pizza with Za'atar is a great choice if you like to order plates with different flavor profiles. The leeks were really good and we had a very fresh salad with tomatillo sauce that was quite special.  The menu is short and focused, but it will give you a hard time to decide what you will have to try on your next visit  They have a really interesting and thoughtful wine list. In two visits, we have received really good recommendations to pair with our food choices, including Las Ondas "Levantamuertos", which is so good that I ended up looking for it online. Definitely, a "Can't wait to go back" restaurant, in an area that's getting very interesting culturally.

Amazing place, the staff is kind, the food is memorable and the ambience is spot on. When you walk in it feels like your in a very cute boho home, the decor is phenomenal creates an amazing scene. The pizza is one of a kind, I recommend mortadella or burrata.
Loved the beans and burrata pizza, amazing dough!!! 🤩🤩 thanks Pombito chef 💛
Awesome place, great atmosphere and delicious food, thank you andreina and Javier

Everything about La Natural is warm and inviting: the cozy space, the sweet staff, the details considered with care. Being there is like spending time in a very good friend's home. The pizza is incredible; the fermentation process makes it cloud-like/fluffy but still chewy, and the flavors are both subtle and explosive. The vegetable dishes are equally special, totally a pleasure with so much flavor, & the natural wine list is fantastic. Get the burrata pizza and the zucchini vegetable plate!
Cozy ambience and incredibly tasty pizzas... this is by far Miami’s best new pizza destination btw they sit so well in your stomach!
Is the BEST PIZZA EVER!!! 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻 The place has everything yo need to feel AMAZING. Definitely my favorite place!
Great place, magnificent ambience, and the sourdough... wow! Definitely we will come again, and again. Most recommended.
Great place. Crisp, tasty, creative pizza.
Simply the best pizza in Miami! The other one I love is Seirinkan in Tokyo and they are hand in hand! Bravo La natural!

I had such an incredible experience at La Natural. Not only is the pizza truly amazing and one of the best pizzas I've ever had, the other dishes were delicious, innovative and fresh! I would highly recommend the papaya and the zucchini appetizers! The owners truly make you feel at home and their attention, love and impeccable taste can be felt through the curation of the natural wine, the menu and the space!!  La Natural is such a special restaurant that Miami is truly lucky to have!

What a treat. This is exactly the kind of spot that Miami was missing.  Incredible food made from the heart, amazing service and a decor that makes you feel like you are in Europe.  Pizza is probably the best pizza you can have in Miamo but the “plates” which are mostly vegan are just unbelievable. Complimented with a wine list of all natural wines that just makes this an amazing experience  Don’t miss it. Book NOW! You will not regret it.  You’re welcome ;-)
incredible pizza, fantastic wine selection, veggie plates are simply perfect. all done by people that truly love food. can't go wrong
Best place, the food and the environment is incredible !!
There’s nothing like La Natural. As a New York transplant, hands down the best sourdough pizza joint in all of Florida. Amazing vibe, amazing service, amazing food and amazing staff!!!

Three times in three weeks...that’s how good La Natural’s naturally leavened (AKA sourdough) pizza is! The dough has the perfect texture, bite - and taste. Simplicity is the name of the game at this spot... Few ingredients, lots of flavor - which I really appreciate. My fave is the za’atar and onions pie...And because pizza...the menu is rounded out by an interesting selection of (mostly) veggie dishes. All very creative in the flavor combinations and presentation...The winner for me are the roasted leeks, the giant beans and the kumato tomatoes. Though you can’t deny the roasted pineapple a place at the table. Last but not least is the natural wine selection. I’m a pét-nat head so the City Pop was my go-to choice... I would be remiss if I didn’t mention the warm atmosphere of the actual restaurant...simple but thoughtful, like the food.

(Translated by Google) I love leeks and all wines! the pizza is divine. my favorite restaurant in miami  (Original) Los leeks y todos los vinos me encantan! la pizza es divina. mi restaurante favorito en miami

Since the day this place opened I have been going almost every other day. The ambiance is calm, and very pleasant for enjoying a quiet dinner but also special for a birthday gathering. You can really tell the owners put a lot of love and effort into every detail of this restaurant. From the ingredients in the food all the way to the decor and environment. Excellent customer service! Its not every day you find an authentic eatery like this one in Miami. I wouldn't bring small children here, definitely perfect for adults!

The pizza dough texture is the perfect balance between crunchy and chewy, due to it being naturally leavened—which is also way easier to digest for those of us who tend to ‘avoid gluten’. Flavors pop in your mouth and leave you wondering how so much can come from such simple ingredients. This place embodies ‘less is more’ in everything detail, from food to design. The secret is the quality and intention of it all. Favorite items: burrata pizza and giganta beans (yes, trust!).

What can I say? This is without a doubt the best pizza in miami and probably one of the best in America, sourdough crust and top quality ingredients on a wood fire oven. Do yourself a favor and go try out! Thanks to Javier and Andreina (owners) for being so attentive, you can tell how much love they have put in their business!
This was such an amazing experience, the owners were super attentive and all of the pizzas that we tried were outstanding, definitely coming back!!!!
If you are looking for an outstanding pizza.... you found it! Amazing place, we tried almost the entire menu and everything was SO GOOD! Love the music and the atmosphere!
Excellent service, atmosphere and amazing food.

This place is a hidden gem. The decoration is simple yet magic. You know that the owners want to make you feel at home, and yet they make you feel that your coming home. The service is second to none, and the food is just amazing. The softness, taste, and texture of the pizza dough is incredible! Thank you for a fabulous experience, definitely coming back again!
La natural pizzas are second to none. Incredible ambiance.
Best Pizza best ambiance, great wines and beers!!!
This is truly one of the best places I've eaten at in Miami. GREAT vibes, incredible food, and definitely owned by people who love food and care about their customers.

The pizza was fluffy and light! You can feel the effort put into it! We were told about how the crust was made and the process is so amazing. They worked with our requests and the food came so quickly! We will be going back again. I quote my daughters "this was the best pizza in the wholllleeee world!!!"
The pizza was AMAZING and the employees were so nice and helpful with our modifications!👏

Best pizza I ever had. Vegetables dishes were outstanding. The restaurant has a beautiful atmosphere, music is uplifting, wine delicious and service is so good that you don’t feel you are in Miami. There is so much love and attention to details in this restaurant that you don’t want to leave, and when you finally do, you leave feeling restored. La natural is my new favorite restaurant in miami. Can’t wait to go back!
It was ok. Not memorable
AMAZING PIZZA!!!

I would love to give more chance to them but the tomato on the pizza was red and too acid. Also it’s better if you don’t drink while you work, you can finish saying something that you’ll regret. Not worth to go back
Pizza was ok. Period shamming by the owner was NOT ok.

BEST PIZZA IN FLORIDA! I don’t get impress easy to be honest... but La Natural it’s the best place on earth if like sourdough 🍕Pizza, natural and over the top fresh ingredients, natural skillfully curated 🍷wine selection and friendly and charming treat from staff. 🙏 I will come back over and over to try the whole menu. CONGRATULATIONS!! Just wow!!!! 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻

The food was so fresh, light and creative! Love the food, wine AND the atmosphere! Even the owners were great, made us feel like VIP! They even have a nice little patio to sit outside which is perfect for the weather we have been having lately. Can’t wait to see what they will become in the months to come!
